TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ILongRunningWebApi

Docs.summary: Methods for long running processes in web APIs

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder AcquireTokenInLongRunningProcess(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> scopes, string longRunningProcessSessionKey) cil managed
Public Function AcquireTokenInLongRunningProcess (scopes As IEnumerable(Of String), longRunningProcessSessionKey As String) As AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder

Docs.param: Scopes requested to access a protected API
Key by which to look up the token in the cache
Docs.summary: Retrieves an access token from the cache using the provided cache key that can be used to access another downstream protected web API on behalf of a user using the OAuth 2.0 On-Behalf-Of flow. See https://aka.ms/msal-net-long-running-obo .
Docs.returns: A builder enabling you to add optional parameters before executing the token request
Docs.remarks: This method is intended to be used in the long running processes inside of web APIs.
Docs.exception: is thrown if the token cache does not contain a token with an OBO cache key that matches the .

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> scopes, string userToken, ref string longRunningProcessSessionKey);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> scopes, string userToken, string& longRunningProcessSessionKey) cil managed
Public Function InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi (scopes As IEnumerable(Of String), userToken As String, ByRef longRunningProcessSessionKey As String) As AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder
abstract member InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi : seq<string> * string * string -> Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder

Docs.param: Scopes requested to access a protected API
A JSON Web Token which was used to call the web API and contains the credential information about the user on behalf of whom to get a token.
Key by which to look up the token in the cache. If null, it will be set to the assertion hash by default.
Docs.summary: Acquires an access token for this web API from the authority configured in the application, in order to access another downstream protected web API on behalf of a user using the OAuth 2.0 On-Behalf-Of flow. See https://aka.ms/msal-net-long-running-obo . This confidential client application was itself called with a token which will be provided in the userToken parameter.
Docs.returns: A builder enabling you to add optional parameters before executing the token request
